biblio_authors: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
description: Provides a synthesis of the analyses and policy recommendations contained in the OECD publication: Babies and bosses, v. 1-v. 4 (c2002-c2005) and extends the analysis to include other OECD countries, presenting indicators for all OECD countries for 2005, where possible.
title: Babies and Bosses - Reconciling Work and Family Life
